fieldset.label: Other Configuration
fieldset.description: Options are set to package defaults unless otherwise modified.

field.name: prevalence
field.description: allows to give more or less weight to particular observations; default = NULL: each observation (presence or absence) has the same weight; if value < 0.5: absences are given more weight; if value > 0.5: presences are given more weight
field.title: weighted response weights

field.name: var_import
field.description: number of permutations to estimate the importance of each variable
field.title: resampling

field.name: do_full_models
field.description: calibrate & evaluate models with the whole dataset?
field.title: do full models

field.name: linear
field.description: allow linear features to be used
field.title: linear

field.name: quadratic
field.description: allow quadratic features to be used
field.title: quadratic

field.name: product
field.description: allow product features to be used
field.title: product

field.name: threshold
field.description: allow threshold features to be used
field.title: threshold

field.name: hinge
field.description: allow hinge features to be used
field.title: hinge

field.name: lq2lqptthreshold
field.description: number of samples at which product and threshold features start being used
field.title: product/threshold feature threshold

field.name: lq2lqthreshold
field.description: number of samples at which quadratic features start being used
field.title: quadratic feature threshold

field.name: hingethreshold
field.description: number of samples at which hinge features start being used
field.title: hinge feature threshold

field.name: beta_threshold
field.description: regularization parameter to be applied to all threshold features; negative value enables automatic setting
field.title: threshold feature regularization

field.name: beta_categorical
field.description: regularization parameter to be applied to all categorical features; negative value enables automatic setting
field.title: categorical feature regularization

field.name: beta_lqp
field.description: regularization parameter to be applied to all linear, quadratic and product features; negative value enables automatic setting
field.title: linear/quadratic/product feature regularization

field.name: beta_hinge
field.description: regularization parameter to be applied to all hinge features; negative value enables automatic setting
field.title: hinge feature regularization

field.name: defaultprevalence
field.description: proportion of occupied locations; default is 0.5 meaning that the proportion of presences in the study area is equal to absences
field.title: prevalence
